Description: BC Rich Classic Eagle Deluxe. Rare and beautiful guitar in excellent condition. Comes with Musicians Friend gig bag.   Specifications (from Musician's Friend): Construction: neck through Body wood: nato (eastern mahogany) with 18mm arched maple cap and AAA quilted maple veneer top Body thickness: 40mm Top style: deep arched Body binding: white multi-ply and white pearloid perfling and white pearloid inlaid stringers Headstock style: traditional 3 to a side Headstock color: paint to match with AAA quilted maple veneer Headstock binding: white multi-ply and white pearloid purfling Tuners: Grover Super Rotomatics (stair stepped buttons) Neck wood: maple Back of neck: paint to match Neck binding: white multi-ply binding and white pearloid fingerboard side runners Fretboard: ebony Inlay: white pearloid eagle in flight Frets: 24 jumbo 2.7mm Factory strings: 9 ” 42 Nut: 43mm Scale: 25-1/2" Bridge: Tune o matic Tailpiece: stop bar Pickups: 2 chrome covered Rockfield SWV vintage humbuckers Controls: 2 volumes, 1 three-way toggle, 1 tone and 2 individual mini switches for individual pickup coil tapping Hardware: chrome Special features: white pearloid capped rotary knobs and chrome pickup bezels
Title: BC Rich Classic Eagle Deluxe in Transparent Black Burst
